Adele looked astonishing as she continued to show off her weight loss.

The Hello! hitmaker, 31, showed off her slimmed-down frame when she posed up a storm with her friend Drake at his birthday bash, in Hollywood on Thursday.

In the gorgeous snap, Adele was giggling away as she posed with her smiling close friend and fellow musician Drake.

The songstress was wearing an off-the-shoulder black dress which perfectly framed her trim figure.

Drake dressed for his special occasion in a pinstriped jacket.

Taking to Instagram , the singer drizzled her account with a single picture from the glittering evening which drew attention to her incredible figure and good looks.

The chart-topper described the birthday boy as one of the "kindest and funniest" people she has ever met when she penned a heartfelt tribute on Instagram.

She wrote: "Happy birthday to one of the kindest and funniest people I’ve met @champagnepapi."

Adele joked about how she'd shed the pounds, saying she doesn't cry anymore but "sweats".

(Image: WireImage)

(Image: GC Images)

The singer has reportedly dropped more than a stone after taking up pilates and working out with famous pal Ayda Field.

Mum-of-one Adele looked like she was letting her hair down as she pulled a few poses for the camera with her pals.

Her new look comes amid rumours that she's getting serious with her new boyfriend, grime artist Skepta, 37.

The relationship is said to be getting serious with rumours that she's now introduced him to her friends.

It was reported the Hello! warbler was dating fellow Tottenham native Skepta following her split from husband Simon Konecki.

After the two musicians are alleged to have enjoyed "a string of dates", Adele is now said to have let Skepta meet her showbiz pals, including James Corden and writer Laura Dockrill.
